karma; rupayen rupaya alla ganimin;eya pilibadawa sitha meheyawamin swayan tharka witharka goda nagamin; apa manasa thulama prathinirmanaya kara gatha yuthu sinama nirmanayak bawa mata watahune eya dewani wara narambaimediya.adhyakshawaraya apa as idiriye widahalana rupa samudaya ;penwana deyata wada behewin wadi deyak dhwanaya karayi.eenisa karma narambaima jiwana athdakimakata sahabhagi wimen labana pragnyawaapa wetha pradanaya karanne apa thula pawathna pragnyawa ha samaga gatumakathi karamini.
